headline: Marsh McLennan Agency Acquires Robins Insurance
summary: WHITE PLAINS, N.Y., September 02, 2025--Marsh McLennan Agency (MMA), a business of Marsh and a leading provider of business insurance, employee health and benefits, retirement and wealth, and private client insurance solutions across the US and Canada, today announced the acquisition of Robins Insurance, a Nashville, Tennessee-based independent insurance agency. Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed.
